snippet: Laurie Anderson and the Kronos Quartet collaborated in “Landfall,” a new piece presented as part of the Peak Performances series at Montclair State University in New Jersey.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews music piece Landfall, composed and performed by Laurie Anderson with Kronos Quartet, at Montclair State University as part of its Peak Performances series.
lead_paragraph: Laurie Anderson and the Kronos Quartet collaborated in “Landfall,” a new piece presented as part of the Peak Performances series at Montclair State University in New Jersey.

headline.seo: Laurie Anderson and Kronos Quartet at Montclair State
headline.main: A Lament for the Wrath of a Storm and the Losses It Wrought
headline.print_headline: A Lament for the Wrath of a Storm and the Losses It Wrought
